attributes.action: PASS RESPONSIBILITY OF MP PAY & ALLOWANCES TO TAXPAYERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayers constitute the employers of Parliament employees. The pay and allowances must be determined by the 'employer' not the employee. All allowances must be open knowledge to the taxpayers. Taxpayers to determine pay & allowances at each election. Performance must play a future role in determining Pay & benefits of MPs.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPs-accountable/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
